titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a standard for exposure to radon in indoor environments.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 8/5/1987--Introduced. Amends the Clean Air Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to promulgate a standard for exposure to radon in the interior of buildings.
